# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Given its high value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than $80 to you, potentially up to $100. Considering this, I propose a special introductory price of $95 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and won't be available once you decide to purchase. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the exceptional benefits of our product. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer
